title: The Best Boss Battle in Every Zelda Game

media:group.media:title: The Best Boss Battle in Every Zelda Game
media:group.media:description:
What is EVERY Zelda game's best boss battle? From the original on the NES all the way through to Breath of the Wild on the Switch, here are my picks for every Zelda game's best boss fight!

►Follow me on Twitter! http://www.twitter.com/Zeltik
or Instagram: @zeltikinsta
► Music in this video:
Nintendo

Sources:

Zeldawiki: https://zelda.fandom.com/

OoA Ramrock Fight: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3VBeXHtVZHw
OoS Gleeok Fight: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IL6_46oTcLI
PH and ST from Archive64: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UChI2IE-6YrYGDPfXvUIpdXg
ALBW Stalblind footage: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fIfqyyYXdSI
FS: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rvhn74pEa2M
FSA: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bSI_oswB1Kc

All other footage not recorded by myself taken from ZeldaMaster (https://www.youtube.com/c/ZeldaMasterLuke) and ZorZelda (https://www.youtube.com/c/ZorZelda)
